messages.subject: Re: a funny
messages.msgSnippet: But why..........?  Please indulge me a little here, and continue the follwing word with your own thoughts.
messages.messageBody:
But why..........? Please indulge me a little here, and continue the
follwing word with your own thoughts.
"Because........................................................"
Just trying to get some proactive dialogue going here. Charlotte has sasid
]she'll think on an expansion of her excellent 'one liner'.
There are reasons why we all keep our kids at home - and there are different
answers from different parents - but I'm trying to see the reasons/opinions
have on what they think educational systems all over the world should take
into consideration regarding the educating of our next generation of
leaders, politicians, and opinion makers. Sending them home is a good idea
but only because we value our kids in a different light to what some
bureaucrats do. so what are those differences.
And if anyone is interested I can forward someone a pdf copy of our latest
newsletter to put up on a web page somewhere - just incase people might
like to understand how we do things 'down under'!
Gollumgregg - a lover of hobbits - especially purged, gutted, filleted and
roasted over a slow fire. Cordon Bleu my Precious!
Pls send cc to gollum@... as infrequent problems plague the curtin
address

----------
